title: Leaver Buster Appeal
body: I have been placed in low priority queue and every time i get disconnected I try my best to rejoin and eventually i get back in I have never intentionally left a game I was hoping that I could get placed out of low priority .

replies.body: An account would only obtain [leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)through multiple leaves and not a single game, so it's important to resolve whatever is disconnecting you.  Even if it's not intentional, it does still cause others a negative experience.  Now, if you're disconnecting in game then your network has some issues that can get fixed up.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Hope that helps!
